post.author: Admin
post.title: Halloween Candy for the Band
post.description:
Halloween Treats
We would like to give our marching band kids some treats to enjoy close to Hallow
post.content:
Halloween Treats

We would like to give our marching band kids some treats to enjoy close to Halloween. We will be making individual goodie bags for each student and are asking for candy donations (no nuts please). Please have your student drop off the Fun Size individually wrapped candy donations in the box at the back of the Green Band room beginning October 13, and no later than Monday, October 26th.

Please click on this link to sign up.

If you have any questions, please contact Nancy Chester at n.chester@sbcglobal.net

Thank you for your help!
